de.esoco.lib.app

Class CommandLineException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • de.esoco.lib.app.CommandLineException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CommandLineException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    An exception that indicates an invalid command line option in a CommandLine. Invalid options are either missing completely or have an illegal option value. This is a runtime exception because it may occur anytime during command line processing.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandLineException

        public CommandLineException(java.lang.String sMessage,
                            java.lang.String sInvalidOption)
        Creates a new instance for a certain invalid command line option. If the error message contains a %s placeholder it will be replaced with the name of the invalid option
        Parameters:
        sMessage - The error message
        sInvalidOption - The name of the invalid command line option

      • CommandLineException

        public CommandLineException(java.lang.String sMessage,
                            java.lang.String sInvalidOption,
                            java.lang.Throwable eCause)
        Creates a new instance for a certain invalid command line option. If the error message contains a %s placeholder it will be replaced with the name of the invalid option
        Parameters:
        sMessage - The error message
        sInvalidOption - The name of the invalid command line option
        eCause - The causing exception
